column4: I'm trying to make a shortcut to a wine program in the taskbar so I make a launcher in in the field "command:" I put in "wine ~/.wine/drive_c/Program\ Files/Exact\ Audio\ Copy/EAC.exe" but when I click on the launcher nothing happens. Any ideas?
don't think there is one. an if there was, it would only be your system that could use it. you could split the files into smaller chunks though, or use a different filesystem if that's an option.
